gwasrapidd

The goal of gwasrapidd is to retrieve data from the NHGRI-EBI Catalog of published genome-wide association studies via the REST API.

Installation

Install the development version from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ramiromagno/gwasrapidd")
